name: The Irish Derby
description: An Irish spin on a vintage cocktail recipe that originally called for bourbon.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces Irish whiskey, such as Redbreast
1/2 ounce Pierre Ferrand Dry Curaçao (or Cointreau)
1/2 ounce freshly squeezed lime juice from 1/2 lime

recipeInstructions.text: Add whiskey, sweet vermouth, curaçao, lime juice, and bitters to a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lime twist.
